channel.title: Need Cleaned Small Client!
channel.description:
Probably Delta based client, or whatever you have that's VERY SMALL and CLEANED OUT.
I DO NOT have ANY CUSTOMS on my server including Godswords, Dragon Claws, Barrows, or any other p2p item except whip, glory, etc...
So I don't need a 15+ MB Client that does.
All I need is one that has clipped gates, etc... Since some don't have that corrected.

item.title: Need Cleaned Small Client!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“ferasownz12, post:1, topic:391302”]Probably Delta based client, or whatever you have that’s VERY SMALL and CLEANED OUT.

I DO NOT have ANY CUSTOMS on my server including Godswords, Dragon Claws, Barrows, or any other p2p item except whip, glory, etc…

So I don’t need a 15+ MB Client that does.

All I need is one that has clipped gates, etc… Since some don’t have that corrected.[/quote]

Clipped gates are server-side I believe. At least for Npcs.
